testcase.classname: Bank of America homepage functionality check
testcase.name: Check that user receives an error message when put invalid enrollment information
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Bank of America Homepage......................................passed When I click on enroll button...............................................passed And I enter invalid six digits account number "123456" in card account box..passed And I enter invalid social security number in social security box...........passed And I click on continue button..............................................passed Then I validate the test by the error message "We're unable to complete your request at this time.".passed
